author: BuckarooBanzay
long_description:
# isogen
Generate isometric images from ingame builds
# Commands

If the `worldedit` mod is present you can use the following command to render the current we-region to a png-file:

```
//isogen [filename]
```

**NOTE**: larger regions require more memory

Full documentation and api: https://github.com/BuckarooBanzay/isogen/blob/master/readme.md
name: isogen
short_description: Generate isometric images from ingame builds
title: Isogen
